sub_title: Strategy Designer - Employee Experience - People Analytics
summary:
Hi there! With over 10 years of diverse experience in design, business management, and engineering, I possess a unique perspective and expertise that sets me apart. I have a passion for strategy formulation and implementation, future thinking, and connecting dots to always see the bigger picture. As a result, I am able to navigate complexity, envision challenging futures, and design impactful solutions that transform organizations. I look forward to using my skills and experience to tackle new challenges and help businesses succeed.

Skills: Strategy formulation & execution, Strategic design, Design operations (DesignOps), Facilitation, Trends & market research, Competitive intelligence, Team leadership, Futures studies, User research, Employee Experience, Service design, Organizational design, Balanced Score Card (BSC).
